subject: Self Care
title: Loneliness and Emotional Health
description: One-minute skill: Loneliness and Emotional Health.

hook.text: Loneliness is as deadly as smoking 15 cigarettes a day. It's not just sad. It's a public health crisis.

buildup.text: The Harvard Study of Adult Development found that relationships â€” not money or fame â€” predict lifelong happiness.

discovery.text: Loneliness isn't about being alone. It's about feeling disconnected. You can be lonely in a crowded room.

twist.text: EQ is the antidote. People with high emotional intelligence build deeper connections that prevent isolation.

climax.text: Invest in relationships like you invest in your career. Schedule connection. Be vulnerable. Show up consistently.

punchline.text: Connection isn't a luxury. It's a survival need.
